title: Effect of chain length, electrolyte composition and aerosolization on the removal of per- and polyfluoroalkyl substances during electrochemical oxidation
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, 10,1377-1388
DOI: 10.1039/D3EW00886J, Paper
Kaushik Londhe, Arjun K. Venkatesan
We utilized a BDD anode in a two-electrode system to investigate the degradation of a suite of PFASs in aqueous matrices.
